name: Bear Arms
description:
Bear Arms is a top-down shooter, where you run and gun your way through hordes of angry, blood thirsty bears. Survive for as long as possible and kill enemies to get high scores.

LeftClick - Shoot

RightClick - Melee

Shift - Dodge

R - Reload

WASD - Move

F - Menu Select Option

Our final(?) build of the game looks pretty decently similar to our original view for the game, unfortunately a lot of enemy types had to be cut due to time constraints. The additional notable change is the lack of the dynamically increasing game speed. This was cut for multiple reasons, but the biggest was just that it didn't feel very fun. Enemies would often jump you if you looked away for even a second, and this often causes chain reactions that just led to unavoidable deaths, making it more frustrating than expected.
